aboutMe.title: About Me
aboutMe.info: Trained as a Full Stack Developer, I have experience working with technologies such as NodeJS, React, Redux among other technologies in the sector. Able to effectively self-manage during independent projects, as well as collaborate as part of a productive team. Passionate about computing, science fiction films and videogames. Currently looking for a job opportunity where I can develop my skills and gain experience.

projects.title: Projects
projects.economy: An app where you can orginze your finances or hire accountants to do it for you
projects.oldrecipes: A recetary in the palm of your hand. In this app you can share recipies or find new recipes already published
